CVE-2018-0044.title: Juniper Device Manager CVE-2018-0044 Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2018-0044.body: Juniper Device Manager is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability.                                                        Successful exploits may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information or gain unauthorized administrative access. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2018-0098.title: Cisco WAP150 and WAP361 Wireless Devices CVE-2018-0098 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-0098.body: Cisco WAP150 and WAP361 Wireless devices are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvf73922.The following products are vulnerable:WAP150 Wireless-AC/N Dual Radio Access Point with PoEWAP361 Wireless-AC/N Dual Radio Wall Plate Access Point with PoE

CVE-2018-0462.title: Cisco Enterprise NFV Infrastructure Software CVE-2018-0462 Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2018-0462.body: Cisco Enterprise NFV Infrastructure Software is prone to denial of service vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvi09672.

CVE-2018-0482.title: Cisco Prime Network Control System CVE-2018-0482 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2018-0482.body: Cisco Prime Network Control System is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvj92813.

CVE-2018-0483.title: Cisco Jabber Client Framework CVE-2018-0483 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-0483.body: Cisco Jabber Client Framework is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvm82721.

CVE-2018-1000013.title: Jenkins Release Plugin CVE-2018-1000013 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1000013.body: Release Plugin for Jenkins is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Release Plugin version 2.9 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-1000014.title: Jenkins Translation Assistance Plugin CVE-2018-1000014 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1000014.body: Translation Assistance Plugin for Jenkins is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Translation Assistance Plugin version 1.15 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-1000033.title: Info-ZIP UnZip CVE-2018-1000033 Out of Bounds Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1000033.body: Info-ZIP UnZip is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow an attacker to crash the application resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible, but has not been confirmed.

CVE-2018-1000034.title: Info-Zip UnZip CVE-2018-1000034 Out of Bounds Read Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1000034.body: Info-Zip UnZip is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2018-1000068.title: Jenkins CVE-2018-1000068 Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1000068.body: Jenkins is prone to an access-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. The following products are affected:Jenkins versions 2.106 and priorJenkins LTS 2.89.3 and prior

CVE-2018-1000168.title: nghttp2 CVE-2018-1000168 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1000168.body: nghttp2 is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2018-1000406.body: Jenkins is prone to the following vulnerabilities: 1. A directory traversal vulnerability2. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities3. Multiple cross-site request forgery vulnerabilities4. Multiple information disclosure vulnerabilities5. Multiple security weaknesses6. Multiple unauthorized-access vulnerabilities7. A denial-of-service vulnerability8. A session fixation vulnerabilityAn attacker may leverage these issues to view arbitrary files within the context of the web server, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of the victim in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, gain access to sensitive information, overwrite arbitrary files, hijack an arbitrary session, perform certain administrative actions and gain unauthorized access to the affected application, or cause denial-of-service condition. This may aid in further attacks.The following product versions are vulnerable:Jenkins weekly 2.145 and priorJenkins LTS 2.138.1 and prior

CVE-2018-1000617.body: Atlassian Floodlight Controller is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Atlassian Floodlight Controller 1.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-1000773.title: WordPress CVE-2018-1000773 Incomplete Fix Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1000773.body: WordPress is prone to an arbitrary file-upload vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to upload arbitrary files to the affected computer; this can result in arbitrary code execution within the context of the vulnerable application. WordPress 4.9.8 and other versions are vulnerable.NOTE: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for the issue described in BID 105305 (WordPress CVE-2017-1000600 Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability).

CVE-2018-1000862.title: Jenkins Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-1000862.body: Jenkins is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code, perform unauthorized actions or gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2018-10142.body: PaloAlto Network Expedition Migration Tool prone to an unspecified information-disclosure vulnerability; fixes are available.Attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to potentially sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.PaloAlto Network Expedition Migration Tool 1.0.106 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-10143.body: Palo Alto Networks Expedition Migration Tool is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may result in the execution of arbitrary code in the context of the highest privileged user. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Palo Alto Networks Expedition Migration Tool 1.0.107 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-10357.title: Trend Micro Endpoint Application Control CVE-2018-10357 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2018-10357.body: Trend Micro Endpoint Application Control is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to execute arbitrary code. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Endpoint Application Control 2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2018-10379.title: GitLab Community Edition and Enterprise Edition CVE-2018-10379 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2018-10379.body: GitLab Community Edition and Enterprise Edition are prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.GitLab Community Edition and Enterprise Edition versions prior to 10.5.8, 10.6.x prior to 10.6.5, and 10.7.x prior to 10.7.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-1044.title: Moodle CVE-2018-1044 Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1044.body: Moodle is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.Moodle 3.1 through 3.1.9, 3.2 through 3.2.6, 3.3 through 3.3.3, and 3.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-1045.title: Moodle CVE-2018-1045 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1045.body: Moodle is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Moodle 3.1 through 3.1.9, 3.2 through 3.2.6, and 3.3 through 3.3.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-1052.title: PostgreSQL CVE-2018-1052 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1052.body: PostgreSQL is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. PostgreSQL versions 10.x prior to 10.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-10561.body: Multiple Dasan GPON Routers is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability and a command-injection vulnerability. An attacker can exploit these issues to bypass authentication or execute arbitrary commands in the context of the affected device.

CVE-2018-11451.title: Siemens EN100 Ethernet Communication Module Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-11451.body: Siemens EN100 Ethernet Communication module and Communication are prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to crash the affected application or consume excess memory, denying service to legitimate users.Following products are vulnerable:SIPROTEC 5 relays with CPU variants CP300 and CP100 prior to 7.80SIPROTEC 5 relays with CPU variants CP200 prior to 7.5Firmware variant IEC 61850 for EN100 Ethernet module prior to 4.33Firmware variant PROFINET IO for EN100 Ethernet module, all versionsFirmware variant Modbus TCP for EN100 Ethernet module, all versionsFirmware variant DNP3 TCP for EN100 Ethernet module, all versionsFirmware variant IEC104 for EN100 Ethernet module, all versions

CVE-2018-11455.title: Siemens Automation License Manager Directory Traversal and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-11455.body: Siemens Automation License Manager is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability and an information-disclosure vulnerability.An attacker can exploit these issues using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access or read arbitrary files that contain sensitive information or to access files outside of the restricted directory or obtain sensitive information and perform other attacks.The following versions are affected:Automation License Manager versions prior to 5.3.4.4Automation License Manager versions prior to 6.0.1

CVE-2018-11463.title: Siemens SINUMERIK Controllers Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-11463.body: Siemens SINUMERIK Controllers is prone to the following security vulnerabilities:1. A heap based buffer-overflow vulnerability.2. An integer overflow vulnerability.3. A security bypass vulnerability.4. An arbitrary code execution vulnerability.5. Multiple privilege escalation vulnerabilities.6. A stack based buffer-overflow vulnerability.7. A buffer-overflow vulnerability.8. Multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilitiesAttackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of affected device, gain host privileges and perform unauthorized actions, to modify or destroy data without having proper authorization to do so, to bypass security restrictions or cause a denial-of-service condition.The following products are vulnerable:SINUMERIK 808D v4.7 all versionsSINUMERIK 808D v4.8 all versionsSINUMERIK 828D v4.7 versions prior to v4.7 SP6 HF1SINUMERIK 840D sl v4.7 versions prior to v4.7 SP6 HF5, andSINUMERIK 840D sl v4.8 versions prior to v4.8 SP3

CVE-2018-11628.title: EMS Master Calendar CVE-2018-11628 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilitiy
CVE-2018-11628.body: EMS Master Calendar is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Master Calendar 8.0.0.127 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-1169.title: Amazon Music Player 	CVE-2018-1169 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1169.body: Amazon Music Player is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

CVE-2018-11762.title: Apache Tika CVE-2018-11762 Arbitrary File Overwrite Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11762.body: Apache Tika is prone to a vulnerability that may allow attackers to overwrite arbitrary files. Attackers can overwrite arbitrary files on an unsuspecting user's computer in the context of the vulnerable application. Apache Tika versions 0.9 through 1.18 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-11770.title: Apache Spark CVE-2018-11770 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11770.body: Apache Spark is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2018-11783.title: Apache Traffic Server sslheader Plugin CVE-2018-11783 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11783.body: Apache Traffic Server is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information; this may lead to further attacks. The following versions are affected:Apache Traffic Server 6.0.0 through 6.2.3Apache Traffic Server 7.0.0 through 7.1.5Apache Traffic Server 8.0.0 through 8.0.1

CVE-2018-11789.title: Apache Incubator Heron CVE-2018-11789 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11789.body: Apache Incubator Heron is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve arbitrary files from the affected system in the context of the application. Information obtained could aid in further attacks. Apache Heron 0.13.0 through 0.17.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-11793.title: Apache Mesos CVE-2018-11793 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11793.body: Apache Mesos is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Apache Mesos version 1.4.0 through 1.7.0 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-11799.title: Apache Oozie CVE-2018-11799 User Impersonation Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11799.body: Apache Oozie is prone to a user-impersonation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to impersonate arbitrary users and perform unauthorized actions. Apache Oozie versions 3.1.1 through 5.0.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-11800.title: Apache Fineract Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-11800.body: Apache Fineract is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Apache Fineract version 0.4.0-incubating, 0.5.0-incubating, 0.6.0-incubating, 1.0.0, 1.1.0 and 1.2.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-11801.title: Apache Fineract Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-11801.body: Apache Fineract is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Apache Fineract version 0.4.0-incubating, 0.5.0-incubating, 0.6.0-incubating, 1.0.0, 1.1.0 and 1.2.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-11804.title: Apache Spark CVE-2018-11804 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11804.body: Apache Spark is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Apache Spark 1.3.x and above are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-12929.body: Linux Kernel is prone to multiple memory corruption vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected device. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2018-12930.title: Linux Kernel Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-12930.body: Linux Kernel is prone to multiple memory corruption vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected device. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2018-12931.title: Linux Kernel Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-12931.body: Linux Kernel is prone to multiple memory corruption vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected device. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2018-1296.title: Apache Hadoop CVE-2018-1296 Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1296.body: Apache Hadoop is prone to an access-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.Apache Hadoop 3.0.0-alpha1 through 3.0.0, 2.9.0, 2.8.0 through 2.8.3, 2.5.0 through 2.7.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-1317.title: Apache Zeppelin Security Bypass and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-1317.body: Apache Zeppelin is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities:1. A security-bypass vulnerability2. An HTML-injection vulnerabilityAn attacker may leverage these issues to bypass certain security restrictions, obtain sensitive information and execute HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user.Apache Zeppelin versions prior to 0.8.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-1321.title: Apache Syncope CVE-2018-1321 Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-1321.body: Apache Syncope is prone to multiple remote code execution vulnerabilities. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Apache Syncope versions prior to 1.2.11 and prior to 2.0.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-1322.title: Apache Syncope CVE-2018-1322 Multiple Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities

CVE-2018-1323.title: Apache Tomcat JK Connector CVE-2018-1323 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1323.body: Apache Tomcat JK Connector is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve arbitrary files from the affected system in the context of the application. Information obtained could aid in further attacks. Apache Tomcat JK Connector 1.2.0 through 1.2.42 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-15969.title: Adobe Experience Manager CVE-2018-15969 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2018-15969.body: Adobe Experience Manager is prone to a HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Adobe Experience Manager 6.0, 6.1, 6.2, 6.3 and 6.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-15970.title: Adobe Experience Manager CVE-2018-15970 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-15970.body: Adobe Experience Manager is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.Adobe Experience Manager 6.0, 6.1, 6.2, 6.3 and 6.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-15971.title: Adobe Experience Manager CVE-2018-15971 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability

An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.Adobe Experience Manager 6.0, 6.1, 6.2, 6.3 and 6.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-19724.title: Adobe Experience Manager Forms CVE-2018-19724 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2018-19724.body: Adobe Experience Manager Forms is prone to a HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Adobe Experience Manager Forms versions 6.4, 6.3, and 6.2 are vulnerable.

Other attacks are also possible. Adobe Experience Manager 6.0 through 6.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-19727.title: Adobe Experience Manager CVE-2018-19727 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-19727.body: Adobe Experience Manager is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.Adobe Experience Manager 6.0, 6.1, 6.2, 6.3 and 6.4 are vulnerable.

This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. SAP NetWeaver AS Java 7.10 ,7.11, 7.20, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40 and 7.50 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-3634.body: Intel Online Connect Access is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability.A local attacker can exploit this issue to crash the operating system, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2018-3635.title: Intel Rapid Storage Technology CVE-2018-3635 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2018-3635.body: Intel Rapid Storage Technology is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attackers may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges. Versions prior to Intel Rapid Storage Technology 16.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-3661.title: Intel System Configuration Utilities CVE-2018-3661 Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2018-3661.body: Intel System Configuration Utilities are prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information or cause a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2018-3696.title: Intel RAID Web Console CVE-2018-3696 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2018-3696.body: Intel RAID Web Console is prone to an authentication bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue can allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. Intel RAID Web Console 3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-3699.title: Intel RAID Web Console CVE-2018-3699 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-3699.body: Intel RAID Web Console is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to perform unauthorized actions such as reading, modifying, or deleting content, or inject malicious content.Intel RAID Web Console 3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-3700.title: Intel USB 3.0 eXtensible Host Controller Driver CVE-2018-3700 Local Code Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2018-3700.body: Intel USB 3.0 eXtensible Host Controller Driver is prone to a local code-injection vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to inject and execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application.Intel USB 3.0 eXtensible Host Controller Driver versions for Microsoft Windows 7 prior to 5.0.4.43v2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-3818.title: Kibana Colored Fields Formatter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-3818.body: Kibana is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Kibana 5.6.6 and 6.1.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-6323.title: GNU Binutils CVE-2018-6323 Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2018-6323.body: GNU Binutils is prone to an integer overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. GNU Binutils 2.29.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-6349.title: WhatsApp CVE-2018-6349 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

CVE-2018-6356.title: Jenkins CVE-2018-6356 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2018-6356.body: Jenkins is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access or read arbitrary files that contain sensitive information or to access files outside of the restricted directory to obtain sensitive information and perform other attacks. CVE-2018-6396.title: Joomla! Google Map Landkarten CVE-2018-6396 Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-6396.body: Google Map Landkarten component for Joomla! is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco bug IDs CSCvh89107, CSCvh89113, CSCvh89132 and CSCvh89142.

CVE-2018-0289.title: Cisco Identity Services Engine CVE-2018-0289 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-0289.body: Cisco Identity Services Engine is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvh11308.

Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug IDs CSCvd69954, CSCve02463, CSCve02785, CSCve02787, CSCve02804, and CSCve04859.

CVE-2018-0312.title: Cisco FXOS and NX-OS Software CVE-2018-0312 Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability

CVE-2018-11354.body: Wireshark is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues by injecting a malformed packet onto the wire or by convincing someone to read a malformed pcap file. Attackers can exploit these issues to crash the affected application or to consume excess memory, denying service to legitimate users. Wireshark 2.6.0, 2.4.0 through 2.4.6, 2.2.0 through 2.2.14 are vulnerable.Note: CVE-2018-11361, CVE-2018-11355, and CVE-2018-11354 affects only Wireshark 2.6.0.

CVE-2018-1140.title: Samba CVE-2018-1140 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1140.body: Samba is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the application to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2018-11410.title: Liblouis CVE-2018-11410 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11410.body: Liblouis is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue cause a denial-of-service condition or possibly have unspecified other impact.Liblouis 3.5.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-11412.title: Linux kernel CVE-2018-11412 Out-of-Bounds Security Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11412.body: Linux kernel is prone to a out-of-bounds security vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions or cause a denial-of-service condition. This may aid in further attacks.Linux kernel 4.13 through 4.16.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-11415.title: SAP Internet Transaction Server CVE-2018-11415 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11415.body: SAP Solution Manager is prone to an cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.Internet Transaction Server 6200.x.x is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-11440.title: Liblouis CVE-2018-11440 Local Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11440.body: Liblouis is prone to a local stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.Liblouisle 3.5.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-11469.title: HAProxy CVE-2018-11469 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11469.body: HAProxy is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.HAProxy 1.8.0 through 1.8.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-11489.title: giflib CVE-2018-11489 Local Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11489.body: giflib is prone to a local heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. A local attacker can exploit this issue cause a denial-of-service condition or possibly have unspecified other impact. giflib 3.0.x is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-1149.title: NUUO NVRmini 2 and NVRsolo Remote Code Execution and Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-1149.body: NUUO NVRmini 2 and NVRsolo are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability and a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition. NVRmini2 and NVRsolo 3.8.0 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-11490.title: giflib CVE-2018-11490 Local Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11490.body: giflib is prone to a local heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. A local attacker can exploit this issue cause a denial-of-service condition or possibly have unspecified other impact. giflib 3.0.x is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-11508.title: Linux Kernel 'kernel/compat.c' Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11508.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. Versions prior to Linux kernel 4.16.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-11516.title: VideoLAN VLC 'input/demux_chained.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11516.body: VideoLAN VLC is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.VideoLAN VLC version 3.0.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-1160.title: Netatalk CVE-2018-1160 Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1160.body: Netatalk is prone to an arbitrary code-execution vulnerability. A remote attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to Netatalk 3.1.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-1171.title: Oracle Solaris Multiple Local Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-1171.body: Oracle Solaris is prone to multiple local security vulnerabilities.These vulnerabilities affect the following supported version:10, 11.3

CVE-2018-11759.title: Apache Tomcat JK Connector CVE-2018-11759 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11759.body: Apache Tomcat JK Connector is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve arbitrary files from the affected system in the context of the application. Information obtained could aid in further attacks. Apache Tomcat JK Connector 1.2.0 through 1.2.44 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-11776.title: Apache Struts CVE-2018-11776 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11776.body: Apache Struts is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may cause a denial-of-service condition. Apache Struts 2.3 through 2.3.34, and 2.5 through Struts 2.5.16 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-11780.title: Apache SpamAssassin CVE-2018-11780 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11780.body: Apache SpamAssassin is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Versions prior to SpamAssassin 3.4.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-11806.title: QEMU CVE-2018-11806 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11806.body: QEMU is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code on the host with the privileges of the hosting QEMU process. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2018-11808.title: Zoho ManageEngine Applications Manager CVE-2018-11808 Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2018-11808.body: Zoho ManageEngine Applications Manager is prone to a access-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Versions prior to ManageEngine Applications Manager 13 (13740 build) are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-12104.body: Airbnb Knowledge Repo is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Airbnb Knowledge Repo 0.7.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-12115.body: Node.js is prone to a memory-corruption. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2018-12581.title: phpMyAdmin CVE-2018-12581 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-12581.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Versions prior to phpMyAdmin 4.8.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-12613.title: phpMyAdmin CVE-2018-12613 Remote File Inclusion Vulnerability
CVE-2018-12613.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a remote file inclusion vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to include arbitrary remote files and execute arbitrary code on the affected application. This may facilitate a compromise of the application and the underlying system; other attacks are also possible. phpMyAdmin 4.8.0 and 4.8.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-12617.title: QEMU CVE-2018-12617 Multiple Local Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-12617.body: QEMU is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities . Attackers can exploit these issues cause a denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users.QEMU 2.12.50 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-12697.title: GNU libiberty CVE-2018-12697 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2018-12697.body: GNU libiberty is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Given the nature of this issue, attackers may also be able to execute arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2018-12699.title: GNU Binutils CVE-2018-12699 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2018-12699.body: GNU Binutils is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users. Given the nature of this issue, attackers may also be able to execute arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed.GNU Binutils 2.30 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-12711.title: Joomla! Core CVE-2018-12711 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilitiy
CVE-2018-12711.body: Joomla! Core is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Joomla! 1.6.0 through 3.8.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-12712.title: Joomla! Core CVE-2018-12712 Local File Include Vulnerability
CVE-2018-12712.body: Joomla! Core is prone to a local file-include vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to obtain potentially sensitive information or to execute arbitrary local scripts in the context of the web server process. This may allow the attacker to compromise the application and the computer; other attacks are also possible.Joomla! Core 2.5.0 through 3.8.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-12714.title: Linux Kernel 'kernel/trace/trace_events_filter.c' Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2018-12714.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability.A local attacker can exploit this issue cause a denial-of-service condition or possibly have other unspecified impact. Linux kernel through 4.17.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-12892.body: Xen is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.Xen 4.7 and later are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-12895.title: WordPress CVE-2018-12895 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2018-12895.body: WordPress is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve sensitive information or execute arbitrary code. This may aid in further attacks. WordPress through 4.9.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-13300.title: FFmpeg Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities

CVE-2018-13406.title: Linux Kernel 'drivers/video/fbdev/uvesafb.c' Local Integer Overflow Vulnerability

CVE-2018-1351.title: Fortinet FortiManager CVE-2018-1351 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1351.body: Fortinet FortiManager is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. FortiManager 6.0.0 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-1361.title: IBM WebSphere Portal CVE-2018-1361 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1361.body: IBM WebSphere Portal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2018-1363.title: IBM Jazz Reporting Service CVE-2018-1363 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability

CVE-2018-1399.title: IBM Daeja ViewONE Virtual CVE-2018-1399 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1399.body: IBM Daeja ViewONE Virtual is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability. Other attacks are also possible. IBM Daeja ViewONE Virtual 4.1.5, 5.0.1, 5.0.2 and 5.0.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-1401.body: IBM WebSphere Portal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2018-14339.title: Wireshark Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-14339.body: Wireshark is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues by injecting a malformed packet onto the wire or by convincing someone to read a malformed 'pcap' file. Attackers can exploit these issues to crash the affected application or to consume excess memory, denying service to legitimate users. Wireshark 2.6.0 through 2.6.1, 2.4.0 through 2.4.7, and 2.2.0 through 2.2.15 are vulnerable.Note: CVE-2018-14367 and CVE-2018-14370 affects the Wireshark 2.6.0 through 2.6.1, and 2.4.0 through 2.4.7.

Successful exploits can allow attackers to bypass the security mechanism and perform unauthorized actions, obtain sensitive information or to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed attempts may lead to a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2018-14800.title: Delta Electronics ISPSoft CVE-2018-14800 Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2018-14800.body: Delta Electronics ISPSoft is prone to stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.Delta Electronics ISPSoft 3.0.5 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-14802.title: Multiple Fuji Electric FRENIC Devices ICSA-18-270-03 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-14802.body: Multiple Fuji Electric FRENIC Devices are prone to multiple security vulnerabilities.An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application, or obtain sensitive information.

CVE-2018-14803.title: Multiple Philips e-Alert ICSA-18-242-01 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-14803.body: Philips e-Alert is prone to the following security vulnerabilities:1. An input-validation vulnerability2. A cross-site scripting vulnerability3. Multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities4. An insecure default permissions vulnerability5. A cross-site request-forgery vulnerability6. A session-fixation vulnerability7. A denial-of-service vulnerability8. A security-bypass vulnerabilityAttackers may exploit these issues to gain unauthorized access to the affected device, or to bypass certain security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions, to compromise the application to access or modify data and to exploit vulnerabilities in the underlying database, to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site or to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected device.e-Alert R2.1 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-14804.title: Emerson AMS Device Manager ICSA-18-270-01 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-14804.body: Emerson AMS Device Manager is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to gain elevated privileges, bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. AMS Device Manager 12.0 through 13.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-14805.title: ABB eSOMS CVE-2018-14805 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2018-14805.body: ABB eSOMS is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.ABB eSOMS version 6.0.2 is vulnerable.

CVE-2018-14806.title: Advantech ICSA-18-296-01 WebAccess Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-14806.body: Advantech WebAccess is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability 2. A directory-traversal vulnerability 3. An arbitrary-file-deletion vulnerability4. A remote-privilege escalation vulnerability An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application, modify and delete files, use directory-traversal sequences (√¢??../√¢??) to retrieve arbitrary files, escalate privileges and perform certain unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks. Advantech WebAccess 8.3.1 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-14851.title: PHP Multiple Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-14851.body: PHP is prone to multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. Successfully exploiting these issues allow remote attackers to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. Versions prior to PHP 5.6.37, 7.1.20, 7.2.8, and 7.0.31 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-14883.title: PHP Multiple Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-14883.body: PHP is prone to multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. Successfully exploiting these issues allow remote attackers to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. Versions prior to PHP 5.6.37, 7.1.20, 7.2.8, and 7.0.31 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-1496.title: IBM Content Navigator CVE-2018-1496 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1496.body: IBM Content Navigator is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. IBM Content Navigator 2.0.3, 3.0.0, 3.0.1, 3.0.2, and 3.0.3 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-1503.title: Multiple IBM Products CVE-2018-1503 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1503.body: Multiple IBM Products are prone to denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition.The following products are affected:IBM WebSphere MQ 7.5.0.0 through 7.5.0.8IBM WebSphere MQ 8.0.0.0 through 8.0.0.9IBM MQ 9.0.0.0 through 9.0.0.3

CVE-2018-1507.title: IBM Rational DOORS Next Generation CVE-2018-1507 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1507.body: IBM Rational DOORS Next Generation is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because they fail to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in an unsuspecting user's browser in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.Rational DOORS Next Generation 6.0.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-1513.title: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Multiple Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-1513.body: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator is prone to multiple unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2018-1517.title: IBM Java SDK CVE-2018-1517 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1517.body: IBM Java SDK is prone to denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2018-15209.title: LibTIFF CVE-2018-15209 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2018-15209.body: LibTIFF is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. LibTIFF 4.0.9 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-1528.body: IBM Maximo Asset Management is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2018-15334.title: F5 BIG-IP APM CVE-2018-15334 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2018-15334.body: F5 BIG-IP APM is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate HTTP requests.An attacker can exploit this issue to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. CVE-2018-15436.title: Cisco Webex Centers CVE-2018-15436 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-15436.body: Cisco Webex Centers are prone to an cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvm14554.

CVE-2018-15438.title: Cisco Prime Collaboration Assurance CVE-2018-15438 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2018-15438.body: Cisco Prime Collaboration Assurance is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvj07251.

CVE-2018-15442.title: Cisco Webex Meetings Desktop App CVE-2018-15442 Local Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2018-15442.body: Cisco Webex Meetings Desktop App is prone to a local command-injection vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to inject and execute arbitrary commands with SYSTEM user privileges; this may aid in further attacks. This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvk70841.

CVE-2018-15454.title: Multiple Cisco Products CVE-2018-15454 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2018-15454.body: Multiple Cisco Products are prone to an remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to reload the affected device, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvm43975.

CVE-2018-1548.title: IBM API Connect CVE-2018-1548 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1548.body: IBM API Connect is prone to an unspecified remote information-disclosure vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. IBM API Connect 2018.1.0 through 2018.2.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-1553.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty CVE-2018-1553 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1553.body: The IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2018-1554.title: IBM Maximo Asset Management CVE-2018-1554 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1554.body: IBM Maximo Asset Management is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2018-15594.title: Linux Kernel 'arch/x86/kernel/paravirt.c' Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2018-15594.body: Linux kernel is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Versions prior to Linux Kernel 4.18.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-15605.title: phpMyAdmin CVE-2018-15605 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-15605.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Versions prior to phpMyAdmin 4.8.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-1563.title: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Multiple Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-1563.body: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator is prone to multiple unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2018-1564.title: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Multiple Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-1564.body: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator is prone to multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to gain access to sensitive information. Information obtained may aid in other attacks.

CVE-2018-15688.title: systemd CVE-2018-15688 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2018-15688.body: systemd is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this vulnerability can allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2018-15716.title: NUUO NVRmini Products CVE-2018-15716 Incomplete Fix Remote Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2018-15716.body: NUUO NVRmini Products are prone to an remote command-injection vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to inject and execute arbitrary commands within the context of the affected application; this may aid in further attacks.NOTE: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for the issue described in BID 106058 (NUUO NVRmini Products CVE-2018-14933 Remote Command Injection Vulnerability).

CVE-2018-15765.title: Dell EMC ESRS Virtual Edition Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-15765.body: Dell EMC ESRS virtual edition is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities.1. An insecure file permission vulnerability2. A plaintext password storage vulnerability3. A information disclosure vulnerability Successfully exploiting this issue can allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information , to bypass certain security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions and use the sensitive data available that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2018-15771.title: Dell EMC RecoverPoint Information Disclosure and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-15771.body: Dell EMC RecoverPoint are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability and a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information or to consume excessive resources, resulting in a denial of service.The following products are affected:Dell EMC RecoverPoint versions prior to 5.1.2.1Dell EMC RecoverPoint Virtual Machine (VM) versions prior to 5.2.0.2

CVE-2018-1584.title: IBM Maximo Asset Management CVE-2018-1584 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-1584.body: IBM Maximo Asset Management is prone to cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2018-15880.title: Joomla! CVE-2018-15880 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2018-15880.body: Joomla! is prone to an html-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Joomla! 1.5.0 through 3.8.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-15919.title: OpenSSH CVE-2018-15919 User Enumeration Vulnerability
CVE-2018-15919.body: OpenSSH is prone to a user-enumeration vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to harvest valid user accounts, which may aid in brute-force attacks. OpenSSH through 7.8 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-16375.title: OpenJPEG CVE-2018-16375 Remote Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2018-16375.body: OpenJPEG is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. OpenJPEG version 2.3.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-5001.body: Adobe Flash Player is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. CVE-2018-5002.title: Adobe Flash Player CVE-2018-5002 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2018-5002.body: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.Adobe Flash Player 29.0.0.171 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-5005.title: Adobe Experience Manager CVE-2018-5005 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-5005.body: Adobe Experience Manager is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.Adobe Experience Manager 6.2, 6.3 and 6.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-8822.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2018-8822 Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-8822.body: Linux Kernel is prone to multiple memory corruption vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected device. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2018-8871.body: Delta Electronics Delta Industrial Automation TPEditor is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Delta Industrial Automation TPEditor 1.89 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-8872.title: Schneider Electric Triconex Tricon 3008 MP Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-8872.body: Schneider Electric Triconex Tricon 3008 MP is prone to multiple memory corruption vulnerabilities. CVE-2018-8953.title: CA Workload Automation AE and Workload Control Center Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2018-8953.body: CA Workload Automation AE and Workload Control Center are prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. CVE-2018-8960.title: ImageMagick CVE-2018-8960 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2018-8960.body: ImageMagick is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. ImageMagick 7.0.7-26 Q16 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2018-9185.title: Fortinet FortiOS CVE-2018-9185 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2018-9185.body: Fortinet FortiOS is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. FortiOS 6.0.0 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-9242.title: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS CVE-2018-9242 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2018-9242.body: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges. Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS 6.1.20 and prior, PAN-OS 7.1.16 and prior, PAN-OS 8.0.9 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-9334.title: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS CVE-2018-9334 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2018-9334.body: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges. Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS 6.1.20 and prior, PAN-OS 7.1.16 and prior, PAN-OS 8.0.8 and prior, and and PAN-OS 8.1.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2018-9335.title: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS CVE-2018-9335 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-9335.body: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The following PAN-OS versions are affected:PAN-OS 6.1.20 and priorPAN-OS 7.1.17 and priorPAN-OS 8.0.10 and priorPAN-OS 8.1.1 and prior

CVE-2018-9337.title: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS CVE-2018-9337 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-9337.body: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The following PAN-OS versions are affected:PAN-OS 6.1.20 and priorPAN-OS 7.1.17 and priorPAN-OS 8.0.10 and priorPAN-OS 8.1.1 and prior

CVE-2018-9861.title: CKEditor CVE-2018-9861 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2018-9861.body: CKEditor is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.Note: This issue was previously titled 'Drupal CKEditor Plugin Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability'. The title have been changed to better reflect the vulnerability information.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.CKEditor version 4.5.10 through 4.9.1 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.
